net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock
Class ServerMessageStore

java.lang.Object
  net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock.ServerMessageStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageStore
public class ServerMessageStore
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageStore

Basic implementation of a MessageStore interface used by the Transport framework. This class is used to queue stored messages which have not been delivered to their destinations.

This class is part of the communication fabric and should not be used by application developers.

          vector which holds the messages to be delivered.
